mkr.ant.taskdefs
Class Java

java.lang.Object
  org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntRef<T>
      org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java>
          mkr.ant.taskdefs.Java

public class Java
extends AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java>

Launcher for Java applications. Allows use of the same JVM for the called application thus resulting in much faster operation.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java)

setCloneVm

public Java setCloneVm(boolean val)
If set, system properties will be copied to the cloned VM--as well as the bootclasspath unless you have explicitly specified a bootclaspath.

Doesn't have any effect unless fork is true.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java.setCloneVm)

setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper

public Java setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper(org.apache.tools.ant.RuntimeConfigurable val)
Sets the wrapper to be used for runtime configuration. This method should be used only by the ProjectHelper and Ant internals. It is public to allow helper plugins to operate on tasks, normal tasks should never use it.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.Task.setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper)
